div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 374 Olynthus, 1934 (764) Burial: 348 B.C. (Clement) Contents: c. 84 AR. Pot hoard, not from excavations Acanthus: 3 tetradr. Amphipolis: 2 tetradr. Chalcidian League: 19 tetradr.; c. 60 tetrob. Disposition: New York Robinson-Clement, Olynthus IX, pp. 186-90, illus. (hd. X) Some of the tetradr. may belong to hd. IX, no. 373 above
